modalContent.title: D2C Platform Development
modalContent.content:
Transform your direct-to-consumer business with our comprehensive e-commerce solutions. We build scalable, high-performance platforms that drive conversions and enhance customer experience.

What's Included:

  • Custom theme development
  • Advanced product catalog management
  • Multi-payment gateway integration
  • SEO optimization
  • Mobile-responsive design
  • Performance optimization

Technologies:

Shopify, WooCommerce, React, Node.js, MongoDB

modalContent.title: 3D/AR Experiences
modalContent.content:
Create immersive product experiences that allow customers to visualize and interact with your products before purchase, significantly reducing return rates and increasing engagement.

What's Included:

  • 3D product modeling and optimization
  • AR try-on experiences
  • Interactive product configurators
  • Virtual showroom development
  • Cross-platform compatibility
  • Performance optimization

Technologies:

Three.js, WebGL, ARKit, ARCore, Blender, Unity

modalContent.title: Smart Automation
modalContent.content:
Streamline your operations with intelligent automation solutions that reduce manual work, improve efficiency, and scale your business operations seamlessly.

What's Included:

  • Custom workflow automation
  • AI-powered customer support
  • Inventory management systems
  • Automated reporting and analytics
  • Integration with existing tools
  • 24/7 monitoring and support

Technologies:

Python, TensorFlow, Zapier, AWS Lambda, Node.js
